About Me

Let me tell you a bit about me

BIO

My name is Zak Grant. I'm a software developer out of the Grand Rapids, MI area. I love working in all types of different languages and I really enjoy learning new ones as well.

Front End Development

Weither I'm working in Angluar, React, or just good old fashioned HTML, I love working in the front end. This also extends to css, utulizing different front end css libraries such as bootstrap, materialize, as well as integrating tools such as sass.

Back End Development

Where the real power is, is in backend development. I love working with both .net core 2.1, as well the JavaScript based framework express.js. Going beyond this, I have worked a bit in both mongo and Sql.

Other Tools and Languages

In the end, I love learning about software development and especially, web development. I am always open to learning new tools and languages, if it means we can make project fast, safer or just more fun!
